meanings.definition: A type of crustacean with a flattened body and seven pairs of legs.
meanings.sent1: The isopods scurried along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I found some isopods under a rock in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The isopods had a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The isopods moved in unison, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The isopods were as flat as pancakes, with legs like tiny sticks.

meanings.definition: Isopods are commonly known as woodlice or pill bugs.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever seen isopods crawling around in the garden?
meanings.sent2: The children collected isopods to study in science class.
meanings.sent3: The isopods threw a party in the compost bin.
meanings.sent4: The isopods scattered like marbles when the rock was lifted.
meanings.sent5: The isopods rolled up into balls when they felt threatened.
